members.name: getToken
members.description: Get the device token

members.name: onTokenRefresh
members.description: Get notified when a token is refreshed

members.name: onNotificationOpen
members.description: Get notified when the user opens a notification

members.name: grantPermission
members.description: Grant permission to receive push notifications

members.name: hasPermission
members.description: Check permission to receive push notifications

members.name: setBadgeNumber
members.description: Set icon badge number. Set to 0 to clear the badge.

members.name: getBadgeNumber
members.description: Get icon badge number

members.name: subscribe
members.description: Subscribe to a topic

members.name: unsubscribe
members.description: Unsubscribe from a topic

members.name: logEvent
members.description: Log an event using Analytics

members.name: logError
members.description: Log an Error using FirebaseCrash

members.name: setScreenName
members.description: Set the name of the current screen in Analytics

members.name: setUserId
members.description: Set a user id for use in Analytics

members.name: setUserProperty
members.description: Set a user property for use in Analytics

members.name: fetch
members.description: Fetch Remote Config parameter values for your app

members.name: activateFetched
members.description: Activate the Remote Config fetched config

members.name: getValue
members.description: Retrieve a Remote Config value

members.name: getByteArray
members.description: Retrieve a Remote Config byte array

members.name: getInfo
members.description: Get the current state of the FirebaseRemoteConfig singleton object

members.name: setConfigSettings
members.description: Change the settings for the FirebaseRemoteConfig object's operations

members.name: setDefaults
members.description: Set defaults in the Remote Config
